Name: Life After The Living
About the game: Life After The Living is a FPS Zombie Survival game. Key Features Player Stats tracking, Health, Hunger, Thirst, Tiredness, Stamina, Arm Fatigue for Melee Combat, Basic EXP/Leveling System (Plans To Expand Soon), Survival Timer to track days Survived, Weapon Health, Repair Benches, Beds To Sleep, Lock Picking Ability, There are several Weapons in game already, Multiple Zombie Types
